Plot: Ishikawa Ango is a very capable detective that lives only for his job. One day, while investigating a crime scene, he gets shot in the head by the criminal that was still lurking about. ...
Title: Border: Keishichô Sôsa Ikka Satsujinhan Sôsa Dai 4-gakkari
Actors: Shun Oguri, Munetaka Aoki, Haru, Ken'ichi Endô
